text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Finally this day has come, the first “Arima 
Kinen” at the end of the year!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
After all, the attention is on the sister showdown between Biwa 
Hayahide and Narita Brian, who has left a blank sheet just before 
the realization last time!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
The stands are packed with fans who 
do not wish to miss this race!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I'm deeply moved, the day we met has finally come.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …Yeah, I was waiting for this day too.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
The winning equation has already been built up. I'm not going to 
give up the win just because you are my little-sister.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Your head is as big as ever. It wouldn't be our race if we keep 
thinking about difficult things, right?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Ehaha, that may be right. We've been doing 
this since we were kids, our race…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Let's go to the stage of “Sister showdown”.
